editModal.title: Edit Score
editModal.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear this score?

report.noData: No score data found or calculation impossible. Possibly missing Oni/Ura scores.

guideModal.title: Song Recommendation Guide
guideModal.notice: Note: The recommendation algorithm is continuously optimized, and results may change.

principle.title: Principle
principle.desc: The recommendation system intelligently analyzes your B20 scores (top 20 best scores in each dimension):
principle.item1Desc: Priority is given to songs you haven't played or have high potential for improvement.
principle.item2Desc: Recommends songs with appropriate difficulty based on your B20 constant median.
principle.item3Desc: Recommends songs that effectively improve your ability in the selected dimension.

howTo.title: How to Use
howTo.step1Desc: Click the left menu to select the dimension you want to improve (Rating/Stamina/Speed, etc.).
howTo.step2Desc1: China Server Filter: When enabled, calculations may be biased due to some missing song data.
howTo.step2Desc2: Difficulty Adjustment: Adjust recommendation difficulty via buttons. Base = your B20 constant median + 0.1.
howTo.step3Desc: The list is sorted by priority, showing rank, title, constant, accuracy, diff, and user rating.

strategy.title: Strategy
strategy.item1: Unplayed and played songs are recommended in approximately a 1:1 mix.
strategy.item2: All Perfect (AP) songs will not appear in the recommendation list.
strategy.item3: Duplicate songs (e.g., standard vs. cover versions) are filtered out.
strategy.item4: Recommended difficulty will not exceed your B20 base + adjustment to avoid frustration.

guide.disclaimer: This rating system is designed to analyze weaknesses for targeted practice. Do not use for competition.
guide.bindId: Please bind your Donder Hiroba ID
guide.btnSkip: I don't have a Hiroba ID, skip and manual import
guide.syncStep1: Go to Donder Chart, bind ID and sync scores.
guide.syncStep2: Ensure data is latest and public. If not, click export and upload.
